Title: Relates to child support for children over 21 years old who are severely and permanently mentally or physically disabled and unable to live independently
Summary: Relates to child support for children over 21 years old who are severely and permanently mentally or physically disabled and unable to live independently.
LawCode: Amd ยง413, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, in relation to child support for any child over 21 years of age who is severely and permanently mentally or physically disabled and unable to live on their own
